response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item with a significant value, tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you for $10,000. This price reflects its high quality and the benefits it will bring to you.
